description: Cosy up with this hot chocolate recipe. It's nutritionally approved, sweetened with maple syrup and made extra special with cinnamon and vanilla custard powder.
keywords: Drinks,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Autumn,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Healthier Hot Chocolate Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs cocoa powder (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients in a small saucepan and whisk to combine. Place over low heat, whisking constantly, for 10 minutes or until mixture starts to simmer. Remove pan from heat and divide between 2 heatproof glasses. Dust with extra cocoa. Serve.
